summary: User timeline_16 documents a journey through depression and anxiety, showing gradual progress with therapy and medication.

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. wrote in my journal Therapy is really helping. I acknowledge my progress Still have rough days. I'm worthless and pathetic But they're getting less frequent. I gave up trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I want to give up on everything Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I'm failing at everything But I remembered my safety plan called the crisis hotline and texted my sponsor. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I hate myself so much I don't care about anything anymore Started using the coping strategies from therapy. joined a support group I'm trying to be patient with myself. I acknowledge my progress
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Nothing will ever get better I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I can't get out of bed anymore Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. practiced my coping strategies Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm tired of existing I'm worthless. I gave up trying Did one small thing today - made my bed. set healthy boundaries Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I'm disgusting I can't focus on anything. I'm failing at everything My therapist recommended meditation so I reached out for help and I'm learning healthier coping skills
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Starting to see the light at the end of the tunnel. wrote in my journal Therapy is really helping. I deserve to get better Still have rough days. I'm worthless and pathetic But they're getting less frequent. I hurt myself again
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. Life is meaningless I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I've been drinking to cope Today though, I managed to wrote in my journal which is a small victory.
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: I feel anxious all the time. I can't do anything right I'm completely numb Started using the coping strategies from therapy. joined a support group I'm trying to be patient with myself. I'm learning healthier coping skills
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I push everyone away when I'm depressed. I'm disgusting I've been drinking to cope Trying to communicate better with my partner. started going to therapy I apologized and explained what I'm going through. Small steps are still progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. Everyone would be better off without me I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I'm completely numb But I've been practicing the breathing exercises practiced my coping strategies and it's starting to help. I'm building a support system
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm disgusting I feel like I'm ruining everything. I gave up trying We decided to try couples therapy. used my DBT skills Had our first session and it went better than expected. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I'm broken beyond repair I hurt myself again I know I need help so I asked for support My therapist suggested I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I deserve to suffer Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I can't get out of bed anymore But I remembered my safety plan started going to therapy and texted my sponsor. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
